Sentencing postponed for Kuresa Anderson who jumped behind wheel of Auckland bus while drunk https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/sentencing-postponed-for-kuresa-anderson-who-jumped-behind-wheel-of-auckland-bus-while-drunk/I53OOVG3TFBWJLAGTYQ2RWMJNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/sentencing-postponed-for-kuresa-anderson-who-jumped-behind-wheel-of-auckland-bus-while-drunk/I53OOVG3TFBWJLAGTYQ2RWMJNQ/ Craig KapitanHe said he drank 'two goons and was trying to be stupid' but didn't want to steal the bus. Sun, 15 Dec 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Kuresa Anderson has pleaded guilty to drunkenly jumping in the driver's seat of a $400,000 Auckland Transport bus as his mates chased the driver away, releasing the handbrake and causing the bus to lurch several metres back and forth.

Corrections deploys staff to private Auckland prison where gang members filmed TikToks on smuggled phones https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Corrections-deploys-staff-to-private-auckland-prison-where-gang-members-filmed-tiktoks-on-smuggled-phones/HRJ3NDM2NRGTNHLVYGUEDSBMUY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ Corrections-deploys-staff-to-private-auckland-prison-where-gang-members-filmed-tiktoks-on-smuggled-phones/HRJ3NDM2NRGTNHLVYGUEDSBMUY/ George BlockThe Ombudsman has also raised concerns over the treatment of people inside Auckland South. Sat, 14 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Convicted double-murderer Mikaere Puata Chaney and other inmates feature in a string of photos taken behind bars at Auckland South Corrections Facility, then posted to instgram. Staff at the Serco-run prison have seized a phone and asked Instagram to remove the account.
